20110127190604.000|20110127190604.000|CC1|>>> THE CONGRESSIONAL SYSTEM    
20110127190604.000|20110127190606.000|CC1|INVESTIGATING THE CAUSE OF THE  
20110127190606.000|20110127190607.000|CC1|FINANCIAL CRISIS THEY ISSUED    
20110127190607.000|20110127190608.000|CC1|THEIR FINAL REPORT.             
20110127190608.000|20110127190611.000|CC1|A SCATHING INDICTMENT OF BOTH

20110127190612.000|20110127190614.000|CC1|STREET UT EXECUTIVES.           
20110127190614.000|20110127190616.000|CC1|THE COMMISSION WAS COMPOSES OF  
20110127190616.000|20110127190617.000|CC1|SIX DEMOCRAT, FOUR REPUBLICANS. 
20110127190617.000|20110127190621.000|CC1|IT DUG DEEPLY INTO THE ACTIONS, 
20110127190621.000|20110127190622.000|CC1|AND NEGLIGENCE OF OFFICIALS AT  
20110127190622.000|20110127190624.000|CC1|REGULATORY AGENCIES, INVESTMENT 
20110127190624.000|20110127190625.000|CC1|BANKS, CREDIT RATING COMPANIES  
20110127190625.000|20110127190628.000|CC1|AND MORTGAGE LENDERS.           
20110127190628.000|20110127190631.000|CC1|>> WE CONCLUDED, FIRST AND      
20110127190631.000|20110127190634.000|CC1|FOREMOST, THAT THIS CRISIS WAS  
20110127190634.000|20110127190636.000|CC1|AVOIDABLE, DESPITE THE EXPRESS  
20110127190636.000|20110127190638.000|CC1|VIEW OF MANY IN THE CIRCLES OF  
20110127190638.000|20110127190639.000|CC1|FINANCIAL AND POLITICAL POWER   
20110127190639.000|20110127190642.000|CC1|THE CRISIS COULD NOT HAVE BEEN  
20110127190642.000|20110127190644.000|CC1|FORESEEN, THERE WERE MANY, MANY 
20110127190644.000|20110127190645.000|CC1|WARNING SIGNS THAT WERE IGNORED 
20110127190645.000|20110127190646.000|CC1|OR DISCOUNTED.                  
20110127190646.000|20110127190650.000|CC1|WE CONCLUDED THAT KEY           
20110127190650.000|20110127190652.000|CC1|POLICYMAKERS, OUR GOVERNMENT,   
20110127190652.000|20110127190653.000|CC1|WAS ILL PREPARED FOR THE CRISIS 
20110127190653.000|20110127190656.000|CC1|AND INCONSISTENT RESPONSE ADDED 
20110127190656.000|20110127190657.000|CC1|TO UNCERTAINTY AND PANIC.       
20110127190657.000|20110127190659.000|CC1|>> THE COMMISSION SAYS BUSH AND 
20110127190659.000|20110127190701.000|CC1|CLINTON ADMINISTRATIONS, THE    
20110127190701.000|20110127190702.000|CC1|CURRENT AND PREVIOUS FEDERAL    
20110127190702.000|20110127190705.000|CC1|RESERVE CHAIRMAN, AND TREASURY

20110127192956.000|20110127192957.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT DOESN'T MATTER

20110127193000.000|20110127193001.000|CC1|WASHINGTON, D.C., EVERYBODY     
20110127193001.000|20110127193003.000|CC1|IMPACTED BY WHAT WAS ALMOST A   
20110127193003.000|20110127193004.000|CC1|DELUGE OF SNOW.

20110127193006.000|20110127193009.000|CC1|IT WAS VERY, VERY WET, CONTENT  
20110127193009.000|20110127193010.000|CC1|SNOW AND TEMPERATURES AROUND
